item.title: Is your Android Library, Lifecycle-Aware?
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Lifecycle events in Android. It has been a pain point for Android developers all over the world. It is no brainer that, most of the times the main cause of a memory leak in the codebase is because an invalid state is accessed which is out of sync with the lifecycle of the activity/fragment of the app.

item.title: I could not find a simple Gesture Detection android library, so I built one
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: While working on various projects, there have been times when I have had to implement various gesture-based events.
